Text: Hey man, thanks for the upload, but you should really rename this torrent.  People would flock to it if it was called Procoder 3 and then there would be a lot more seeders.
Please seed it. I have waiting over night but no one seed it. I did my turn in seeding others.

Problem with Procoder 3

When I add any source file(for PPC normally wiht 320x240 resolution) which is Xvid with .avi file extension, it won't accept it, but generate error message:
"Unable to open Windows Media Source file"

Someone please suggest the solution to this problem.
